description: A wholesome, rich beef casserole with a hint of sweetness. This comforting casserole recipe with capsicum, beans and potato will make the whole family happy.
name: Beef Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, covered, for 1 hour or until beef is tender, adding beans during the last 10 minutes of cooking time. Season and serve.
